name: Spinner (stephenkairos, Jumpier Games, DragonCola)
description:
For the Two Button Game Jam

Controls:

  • A/Left: Trigger blue side. Press to turn counter-clockwise, release to launch towards blue shield.
  • S/Right: Trigger red side. Press to turn clockwise, release to launch towards red shield.
  • Press and hold either to stop momentum.
  • Press and release both at the same time to make things spicier.

Credits:

  • stephenkairos: Programmer, Designer, and Artist [Sprites] (Github)
  • Jumpier Games: Artist [Tilesheets and Titles] and Designer (ArtStation) 
  • DragonCola: Musician (Soundcloud)
  • Kenney: Sound FX, it's free and awesome!
  • Joshua McLean: Inspiration and Music :)

Notes:

  • All files for the game are open source on my Github repository here: Spinner Repo
  • Exporting with Godot is weird, for some reason it works fine in the editor but has bugs in the published files :( It should still be playable, though.
